skill.name: Lynx-speech
skill.description:
Summons a lynx companion.
The lynx is a stealthy hunter.

skill.name: Chord of Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals an ally's Morale.

skill.name: Irresistible Melody
skill.description: You perform a melody so irresistible that all Free Peoples who hear it cannot help but dance.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Harp
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the harp. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Stance
skill.description: When you enter Scribe Stance, you change your Mentor skills into Scribe Manual skills, allowing you to create manuals to teach instruments. Scribing manuals is much more taxing than teaching in person, requires a Blank Mentor Manual, and will apply a 10 day cooldown to all Mentor skills.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Bagpipes
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the bagpipes. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Clarinet
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the clarinet. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Cowbell
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the cowbell. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Drums
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the drum. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Flute
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the flute. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Horn
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the horn. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Moor Cowbell
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play Moor cowbell. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual: Theorbo
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the theorbo. Doing so is much more taxing than training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Feral Strike
skill.description: An eye gouge and slash. This skill works in a 90 degree front arc.

skill.name: Slashing Claws
skill.description: The agile lynx darts from enemy to enemy slashing them with its claws in a forward 180 arc.

skill.name: Surprise Attack
skill.description: A massive attack that works only from stealth. This skill has a high chance of scoring a critical attack. When attacking from behind this attack delivers more damage.

skill.name: Bird-speech
skill.description: Summons a little bird-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Cat-speech
skill.description: Summons a little cat-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Dog-speech
skill.description: Summons a little dog-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Fox-speech
skill.description: Summons a little fox-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Frog-speech
skill.description: Summons a little frog-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Rabbit-speech
skill.description: Summons a little rabbit-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Snake-speech
skill.description: Summons a little snake-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Squirrel-speech
skill.description: Summons a little squirrel-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Turtle-speech
skill.description: Summons a little turtle-friend to brighten your day.

skill.name: Back from the Brink
skill.description:
Revives a defeated ally.
(Can only be used out of combat.)

skill.name: Enter Stealthed State
skill.description: This skill is a fast version of stealth.

skill.name: Get a Grip!
skill.description: As an Uruk you are adept at whipping those lesser beasts in Sauron's army back into shape.

skill.name: Pack Hunters
skill.description:
Wargs are pack hunters. You can target a foe and increase the damage dealt by all members of your war party, while reducing their incoming healing.<rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Pack Flayer Roots target in place, causing them to be unable to block, parry, or evade attacks.
In Shadow: Shadow Pack Lowers the defence and incoming healing of all enemies around the Warg.</rgb>

skill.name: Howl of Unnerving
skill.description: So great is the fear your howl can cause that you shatter the resolve of the mightiest of foes. Does not break stealth.

skill.name: Blood of Fire
skill.description: Rage seething beneath the surface of your flesh takes on a physical manifestation and any daring to attack you will feel the wrath of the Orcs!

skill.name: Undying Rage
skill.description:
When death nears, you gain the ability to call on the power of your blood and become a powerful force of destruction before your flame is extinguished. Most offensive skills are reset when this skill is activated.
You become immune to death while the effect is active, but will lose half of your morale when it ends.

skill.name: Born of Shadow
skill.description: Your heritage extends to the fabric of shadow and you harness a piece of that black energy to grow stronger with each blow from an enemy.

skill.name: Shelob's Gift
skill.description:
Your ancestry affords you incredible powers of recovery. After successfully defeating an opponent, you can immediately drain them of vitality and restore your health. This burst of vitality fills your Venom and briefly increases your toxicity.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Imposing Presence
skill.description: Your presence inspires your allies with greater strength; mostly through fear.

skill.name: Tendon Shred
skill.description: Your teeth bite deeply into your foe, tearing a tendon and opening a chance for a warband manoeuvre.

skill.name: Eye Rake
skill.description:
A swift swipe meant for the eyes. Breaks your opponent's concentration.
This skill will interrupt your target's inductions.
<rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Eye Gash Brute bonus: Decreases block, parry, and evade rating.
In Shadow: Eye Gouge From stealth: Decreases range of targets ranged skills. </rgb>

skill.name: Charge!
skill.description: When the time comes to enter the fray it falls to the Orcs to break battle lines. Your speed increases for a brief period of time. You gain a short immunity to incoming root, stun and daze effects. This skill can only be used while out of combat.

skill.name: Gut Punch
skill.description: When your target begins preparing an attack, you give them a swift punch to the gut to interrupt their preparation.

skill.name: Vital Target
skill.description: Your knowledge of the enemy is so great that you can target vital organs with great efficacy.

skill.name: I See You!
skill.description: Your sight is so keen that you can keep a close eye on an enemy and never lose sight of them.

skill.name: No You Don't
skill.description: Seeing a ranged opponent preparing an assault, you take careful aim and disrupt their attempts.

skill.name: Banner of Terror
skill.description: A terrible banner strikes fear into your enemies, weakening their resolve and adding Dread to the field of battle.

skill.name: Black Speech
skill.description: You spew foul words in the forgotten and vile language of LugbÃ»rz. The conviction and terror inherent in this speech weakens the heart of your enemy.

skill.name: Command Post
skill.description: You place a banner bearing the symbol of the mightiest Orc tribe, the Krahjarn. All who stand near the banner draw strength from the symbol.

skill.name: Web the Earth
skill.description: Your webs can be used to create sticky areas on the ground that slow the movement of any enemy who dares cross them.

skill.name: Smothering Web
skill.description:
Focusing all your energy on a single target you are able to overwhelm them beneath the weight of your webs opening the possibility of a warband manoeuver.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Hatchlings
skill.description: You summon one of your brood to aid you in battle.

skill.name: Knowledge of the Lore-master
skill.description:
Examines the weaknesses and strengths of certain creatures.
Reduces enemy Resistances if out of combat when used.

skill.name: Mentor: Harp
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the harp.

skill.name: Mentor: Bagpipes
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the bagpipes.

skill.name: Mentor: Clarinet
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the clarinet.

skill.name: Mentor: Cowbell
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the cowbell.

skill.name: Mentor: Drums
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the drum.

skill.name: Mentor: Flute
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the flute.

skill.name: Mentor: Horn
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the horn.

skill.name: Mentor: Moor Cowbell
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play Moor cowbell.

skill.name: Mentor: Theorbo
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the theorbo.

skill.name: Travel to Personal House
skill.description: Return quickly to your personal home. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Travel to Kinship House
skill.description: Return quickly to your kinship's house. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Eyepeck
skill.description: This skill will cause the Eagle to break the induction of a target, they are fighting.

skill.name: Confound
skill.description: When Mischief is active, slow the attacks of foes, followed by a daze.

skill.name: Contact Pedlar
skill.description: At campsites, call a Pedlar to whom you and others may sell items.

skill.name: Knives Out
skill.description:
A quick attack that enables counter-attacks.
Temporarily reduces incoming damage, but you cannot Parry, Evade or Block while concentrating on counter-attacks.

skill.name: Practical Joke
skill.description: Whose fault is it if the mightiest of heroes cannot take a joke?

skill.name: Share The Fun
skill.description: Share Stealth with one ally while remaining within 5m of one another.

skill.name: Second Wind
skill.description: Consumes all current fervour and restores power. Amount of power restored is based off the amount of fervour consumed.

skill.name: Shield Wall
skill.description: Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.

skill.name: Force Opening
skill.description: An attack that will open a parry response.

skill.name: Engage
skill.description: Draws enemy threat, making you the target's most threatening opponent.

skill.name: Stagger
skill.description: An attack that impairs the target on a critical hit, or when attacking from behind.

skill.name: Fray the Edge
skill.description:
Taunts the enemy into lowering its defences, increasing the chance of a Fellowship Manoeuvre.
Fellowship Manoeuvre chance increases with each use.

skill.name: Tactics Signal
skill.description: Extends Tactics fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Tactics Signal
skill.description: Extends Tactics fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Tactics Signal
skill.description: Extends Tactics fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Conviction Signal
skill.description: Extends Conviction fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Conviction Signal
skill.description: Extends Conviction fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Conviction Signal
skill.description: Extends Conviction fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Strength Signal
skill.description: Extends Strength fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Strength Signal
skill.description: Extends Strength fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Strength Signal
skill.description: Extends Strength fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Guile Signal
skill.description: Extends Guile fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Guile Signal
skill.description: Extends Guile fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Guile Signal
skill.description: Extends Guile fellowship skill bonus to your fellowship.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description: Charge with a burst of speed. Grants immunity to slowing effects for 10s.

skill.name: Headbreaker
skill.description: A strong blow from the Defiler's staff. Contact with a Defiler's staff can poison many denizens of Middle-earth.

skill.name: Curse of the Coward's Soul
skill.description: Release hallucinogenic spores that strike fear into nearby enemies.

skill.name: Fungal Spores
skill.description: Spores weave their way into the target, helping to speed the healing process.

skill.name: Curse of Deadly Sorrows
skill.description: Douse opponent with corrosive liquid that weakens their armour and releases a soporific gas that reduces Fate, Tactical Mastery, Armour, Resistance, and Finesse.

skill.name: Curse of Sticky Feet
skill.description: Coats the opponent's feet in a sticky substance that slows their movement speed.

skill.name: Fungal Bloom
skill.description: Salves of foul herbs and liquids from the depths of Angmar relieve the sting of wounds on the flesh of foul creatures.

skill.name: Curse of the Lethargic Heart
skill.description: A gourd thrown at the target plagues them with spores, attacking their heart and weakening their resolve. This skill is only effective against players.

skill.name: Fertile Slime
skill.description: Living slime coats the target's wounds and restores health.

skill.name: Fell Sacrifice
skill.description: Returns target ally to activity from defeat. Only useable out of combat.

skill.name: Fell Restoration
skill.description: When finished casting, Fell Restoration instantly restores a huge amount of health to target.

skill.name: Fire Gourd
skill.description: A gourd filled with burning embers is launched at your opponent, setting them alight.

skill.name: Plague Gourd
skill.description: A plague of flies fills a foetid gourd which explodes on your opponent. On critical hit, reduces your opponents Block, Parry, and Evade for 20s.

skill.name: Self-motivation
skill.description: Restores Power.

skill.name: Quick Thrust
skill.description: A fast melee attack.

skill.name: Scathing Mockery
skill.description: AoE fire damage-over-time.

skill.name: Fiery Ridicule
skill.description:
Stacking fire damage-over-time.
Increases +1% Damage per Battle attunement.

skill.name: Smouldering Wrath
skill.description:
A channelled skill dealing huge amounts of fire damage every second.
Duration increases per battle attunement.
This skill consumes 1 attunement per second.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Deft Strike
skill.description: A powerful blow.

skill.name: Shield-bash
skill.description: Quick strike with a shield.

skill.name: Take to Heart
skill.description: A toggle skill that will mark your target. While marked, your target will suffer a reduced chance to hit and is susceptible to more potent versions of your debuffs.

skill.name: Nothing Truly Ends
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally.

skill.name: Our Fates Entwined
skill.description: Fates can be deeply linked if the Rune-keeper wishes. Reduce your fellowship's damage, but pay for it with your own morale. Also, damage will not interrupt your inductions while the Fates are Entwined.

skill.name: Flurry of Words
skill.description: A flurry of chilling words unleashes a swirl of numbing cold on foes around you. An area around you is filled with a flurry of frost, and dealing damage over time.

skill.name: Essence of Winter
skill.description: In writing, the significance of winter is that in time all things must slow, then stop. Lowers your foes' incoming healing and increases their skill Power cost.

skill.name: Chilling Rhetoric
skill.description: Written words can have a chilling effect on their victim. Slows your foe, but damaging the foe will return its speed.

skill.name: Safeguard
skill.description:
Damages the enemy while increasing block chance and healing the Warden.
Second in the Persevere Gambit Chain. Finishing the Chain will enhance Persevere finishing skills.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description:
Damages the enemy while increasing block chance and healing the Warden.
First in the Persevere Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Rousing Words
skill.description:
A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.
+2 to Healing attunement.
This skill generates no threat. Allies affected for at least 5 seconds will gain a tier of Writ of Health.

skill.name: Rune of Restoration
skill.description: Places a healing Runestone upon the ground, healing nearby allies.

skill.name: Epic for the Ages
skill.description:
A big heal.
+Healing per attunement.
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Word of Exaltation
skill.description:
Applies a bubble that briefly increases Morale.
+Bubble potency per attunement consumed.
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Mending Verse
skill.description: Hardships are forgotten and spirits are lifted by such writings. This heal over time stacks with itself. -1% Power cost per Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Writ of Health
skill.description:
Stacking Heal-over-time.
May be applied up to three times, increasing the Writ's tier.
+20% Heal per tier increase.

skill.name: Prelude to Hope
skill.description: Heals the target +2% per Healing attunement.

skill.name: Essence of Storm
skill.description:
A lightning attack increasing +3% Critical Chance per Battle attunement.
Deals +100% damage on critical hits.

skill.name: Ceaseless Argument
skill.description: A quick lightning attack, hard to resist.

skill.name: Scribe's Spark
skill.description: A lightning attack dealing +2% damage per Battle attunement.

skill.name: Shocking Words
skill.description:
A lightning attack dealing +Damage and +Stun duration per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Epic Conclusion
skill.description:
An enormously powerful lightning attack dealing +Damage per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Ambush
skill.description:
When given time to prepare, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Warden's Taunt
skill.description: A shout which deals Light Damage over time.

skill.name: Essence of Flame
skill.description: Fire attack that refreshes Fiery Ridicule on the target.

skill.name: Writ of Fire
skill.description:
Stacking fire damage-over-time.
May be applied up to three times, increasing the Writ's tier.
+20% damage per tier increase.

skill.name: Steel Snaring Web
skill.description:
A ranged attack that targets the victim's legs with sticky webs, rooting them in place.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Litany of Defiance
skill.description: Cries out to surrounding enemies, slowing their attacks. Cashes out all Fortification effects on the Guardian, in order to double their mitigations for a short period of time, while also intercepting 10% of the fellowship's damage for each stack removed.

skill.name: Brutal Assault
skill.description: You use brute strength to hammer home a well placed blow. Taking the Haemorrhage Trait will give your attack a chance to cause a bleed.

skill.name: Improved Shield-blow
skill.description: You strike your opponent with your shield. This skill generates additional threat.

skill.name: Improved Sting
skill.description: A quick stinging blow.

skill.name: Soliloquy of Spirit
skill.description: Your tune is like a slow burning Soliloquy that keeps the spirit bolstered for a time. This is one of the few minstrel morale heals that can be used on the move.

skill.name: Tale of Frost and Flame
skill.description: This aura increases the Fellowship's Frost and Fire Mitigation.

skill.name: Tale of the Elements' Battle
skill.description: This aura increases the Vitality, Tactical Mitigation and Resistance of your Fellowship.

skill.name: Call to Fate
skill.description:
Requires Dissonance or Melody Stance.
Deals Light damage to a single target, with a high Critical chance.

skill.name: Do Not Fall This Day
skill.description: Places an effect on someone that revives them on defeat.

skill.name: Improved Song of Restoration
skill.description: A song that makes an ally's heart glad again, removing some of the evil that currently plagues it.

skill.name: Improved Cry of the Chorus (Melody)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three healing ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you and provides you with a short term immunity to silence.

skill.name: Rune-sign of Flame
skill.description:
<rgb=#00FFDD>Affinity - Fire Affinity skills will change their effects when you use an elemental skill (frost, fire, lightning).</rgb>
A Rune-sign will not only inspire, but infuses an ally with minor elemental powers.

skill.name: Rune-sign of Winter
skill.description:
<rgb=#00FFDD>Affinity - Frost Affinity skills will change their effects when you use an elemental skill (frost, fire, lightning).</rgb>
A Rune-sign will not only inspire, but infuses an ally with minor elemental powers.

skill.name: Rune-sign of Storm
skill.description:
<rgb=#00FFDD>Affinity - Lightning Affinity skills will change their effects when you use an elemental skill (frost, fire, lightning).</rgb>
A Rune-sign will not only inspire, but infuses an ally with minor elemental powers.

skill.name: Shocking Touch
skill.description:
Briefly dazes the foe.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Throat Slash
skill.description: If your enemy leaves themselves exposed to attack with a Flanked! event in the frontal arc of your companion, you have a chance of stunning them and opening a Fellowship Manoeuvre.

skill.name: Frostbite
skill.description: This skill will debuff the frost mitigation of foes in the frontal arc of the companion.

skill.name: Friend of Feline Hunters
skill.description:
Summons a sabre-tooth cat companion.
The sabre-tooth cat hails from the north and can wield the cold of its home.

skill.name: Fury of Winter
skill.description: This skill will do damage to foes in the frontal arc of the companion, it also has an improved critical magnitude. On crit it will apply a flanked event.

skill.name: Friend of Nature
skill.description:
Summons a Bog-guardian companion.
The Bog-guardian excels at dealing damage from range.

skill.name: Rend
skill.description: Makes a full AoE attack, which causes medium damage-over-time.

skill.name: Continuous Blood Rage
skill.description:
Breaks Champion out of any impairing Combat State, removes disarm effects and restores full fervour.
Also reduces power costs, increases Resistance, and briefly grants immunity to impairing Combat States.

skill.name: Adamant
skill.description: Champions shrug off damage that would bring many to their knees.

skill.name: Great Cleave
skill.description: All AoE attacks cost 1 less Fervour Pip.

skill.name: Blood Rage
skill.description: Breaks Champion out of any impairing Combat State and removes disarm effects.

skill.name: Sticky Gourd
skill.description: Smashes the foe with burning pitch, dealing fire damage.

skill.name: Improved Sticky Gourd
skill.description: Smashes the foe with burning pitch, dealing fire damage and burning the target with damage-over-time.

skill.name: Dispel Corruption
skill.description: Removes Corruptions from the foe.

skill.name: Wizard's Fire
skill.description:
A basic sigil which burns your foe over a brief time.
If this skill is used whilst your companion flanks the enemy, your Power will be restored and your fire will burn hotter for a time.

skill.name: Sign of Power: See All Ends
skill.description: Reduces an enemy's ability to score a Critical hit.

skill.name: Burn Hot
skill.description: Drawing upon deep reserves, you let fly with great strength and precision.

skill.name: Mighty Blast: Horn of Gondor
skill.description:
Makes a full AoE attack, which stuns your opponents.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Battle Acuity
skill.description: You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your area-of-effect attacks will deal more damage for a short time. This costs one fewer fervour to activate.

skill.name: Distracting Shot
skill.description:
A shot that dazes the target.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Feint Attack
skill.description:
A quick feint attack that enables several Stealth skills to be used while out of stealth.
Bonus Damage, Critical Chance, and Critical Damage from Stealth are not activated by this skill.

skill.name: Feint Attack
skill.description: Activated by Double-edged Strike, this quick feint attack enables Surprise Strike while out of stealth.

skill.name: Quite a Snag
skill.description:
You attack the enemy's foot, rooting them to the spot and weakening their defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: A Small Snag
skill.description:
Activated by Double-edged Strike, you attack the enemy's foot, rooting them to the spot and weakening their defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Call to Arms: Archer
skill.description: You enlist an Archer to assist you in battle.

skill.name: Sure Aim
skill.description: Your Archer can take additional time to make sure his arrows strike a vulnerable point.

skill.name: Barbed Arrows
skill.description: Your Archer can use Barbed arrows to cause bleeding wounds that slow the target's movement.

skill.name: Evasion
skill.description: Your Archer can increase his evasion abilities for a short time.

skill.name: Lucky Strike
skill.description: Activated by Double-edged Strike, this attack applies a damaging Red gamble to the target.

skill.name: Gambler's Strike
skill.description: An attack that applies a damaging Red gamble to the target.

skill.name: Clever Retort
skill.description:
Take a chance when removing an active Trick; apply one of four effects to the enemy based on the Trick removed.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Trick: Dust in the Eyes will restore Power and allow you to briefly enter Stealth
Trick: Disable will restore Morale
Trick: Enrage will apply a Damage over Time effect
Trick: Counter Defence will deal Damage</RGB>

skill.name: Valiant Strike
skill.description: A melee attack that heals the Morale of nearby allies.

skill.name: Shadow's Lament
skill.description: A powerful melee attack that harms the foe.

skill.name: Press Onward
skill.description: Quickly heals a great deal of Morale and Power while in combat.

skill.name: Earthborn: Strength of the Earth
skill.description:
Quickly regain Morale, Power, and Focus in combat.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Improved Fleetness
skill.description: By spending Focus, you are able to greatly improve your mobility and your ability to fire on the move. Additionally, you may use Focus attacks more frequently.

skill.name: Fleetness
skill.description: By spending Focus, you are able to greatly improve your mobility and your ability to fire on the move.

skill.name: Critical Strike
skill.description: Ambush victims and other dazed opponents are vulnerable to a Critical Strike.

skill.name: Defensive Strike
skill.description: A weak shield attack which increases your Block rating.

skill.name: Submission
skill.description: This wil force a group to kneel before you.

skill.name: Dark Future
skill.description: Power loss over time effect and reduces in and out of combat power regeneration to 0 for 30 seconds. The prospects of victory against Amarthiel seem slim, sapping the player of power.

skill.name: Kneel before me!
skill.description: This wil force an opponent to kneel before you.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Heart of Darkness
skill.description: Reduces all incoming healing to zero, as well as reducing in and out of combat health regeneration to 0 for 30 seconds. The player has been granted a glimpse into Amarthiel's dark heart, and despairs.

skill.name: Shadowed Heart
skill.description: Increases incoming healing by 200% as well as increasing in and out of combat health regeneration by 8 for 120 seconds. The monster has been granted a glimpse into Amarthiel's dark heart and rejoices.

skill.name: Terrible Beauty
skill.description: Greatly reduces the player's damage and combat speed. The terrible beauty of Amarthiel haunts the player's mind, hindering their actions in combat. AOE.

skill.name: Dark Inspirtation
skill.description: Increases in and out of combat power regeneration.

skill.name: Power of the Void
skill.description: Summons a fell icon of darkness.

skill.name: Champion's Command
skill.description: Greatly increases the target's damage and combat speed. Amarthiel's command stirs the target to great feats in battle.

skill.name: Dismissal!
skill.description: Applies a massive, permanent DOT.

skill.name: Forced March
skill.description:
Boosts non-combat movement speed.
This skill deactivates when entering combat.

skill.name: Goad
skill.description: Goads nearby targets to attack the Warden, dealing Light Damage over time.

skill.name: Dagger Throw
skill.description: This well thrown knife will root an in-bound target.

skill.name: Eldar Arrowhead
skill.description: These arrow heads are deadly against corrupted enemies.

skill.name: Weighted Arrow
skill.description: A shaft aimed to slow the movement of your quarry.

skill.name: Bow Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Elven Enemy
skill.description: When you are an enemy of the Eldar, you cannot avoid their unflinching gaze. This skill is the pre-requisite for Archer's Strike.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Blood of the Eldar
skill.description: Even as the Elves fade into the West, there is still great power in the Elven bloodline. This skill restores morale.

skill.name: Archer's Strike
skill.description:
This shot can only be used against those that are enemies of the Elves, who will take devastating damage. It will never miss against on-level creatures. On a critical hit, the target will take power damage as well.
Elven Enemy required to use this skill.

skill.name: Eldar's Cut
skill.description: A close range attack. This attack will knock down the opponent.

skill.name: Eldar's Kiss
skill.description: You release several arrows in quick succession, hitting multiple foes around your target.

skill.name: Dying Time!
skill.description: The Dark Lord demands his due. This skill has a high crit chance.

skill.name: Two Cut
skill.description: Fast attacks against the foes of darkness.

skill.name: Reaping Swing
skill.description: A frontal attack against multiple opponents.

skill.name: Razor Sharp
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.

skill.name: Stabbing Time
skill.description: Blood is the only thing that matters, spill it. This skill delivers a piercing wound.

skill.name: Impressive Flourish
skill.description:
Deals Light Damage over time to the enemy and boosts defences.
First in the Impressive Flourish Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Offensive Strike
skill.description: A double attack.

skill.name: War-cry
skill.description:
A shout dealing Light Damage that grants an evade bonus to the Warden.
First in the War-cry Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Precise Blow
skill.description: An attack that draws the enemy's attention.

skill.name: Maddening Strike
skill.description:
A quick and well-placed attack.
Second in the Impressive Flourish Gambit Chain.
Finishing the Chain will enhance Impressive Flourish finishing skills.

skill.name: Power Attack
skill.description: A powerful damage over time blow. Renders the target vulnerable to Mighty Blow.

skill.name: Piercing Strike
skill.description: A piercing attack.

skill.name: Brink of Victory
skill.description:
A potent attack dealing Light Damage and grants an evade bonus to the Warden.
Second in the War-cry Gambit Chain. Finishing the Chain will enhance War-cry finishing skills.

skill.name: Onslaught
skill.description: Multiple fast attacks that can interrupt inductions.

skill.name: Combination Strike
skill.description: A dual weapon strike.

skill.name: Fierce Resolve
skill.description: Drains morale from the target to heal the Warden.

skill.name: a ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a javelin.

skill.name: Elf Trick
skill.description: A close-ranged attack that dazes foes around the target.

skill.name: Eldar's Slash
skill.description: A close-ranged attack that will hit multiple targets.

skill.name: Mighty Blow
skill.description: A mighty blow that is very difficult to parry or evade. Renders the target vulnerable to Unerring Strike.

skill.name: Boar's Rush
skill.description: A fast charge which has a chance to daze on a critical hit.

skill.name: Wall of Steel
skill.description: A weaving pattern of weapon attacks.

skill.name: Shield Mastery
skill.description: Boosts block and evade rating.

skill.name: Resolution
skill.description: Drains morale from multiple targets within close range, healing the Warden.

skill.name: Spear of Virtue
skill.description: A stabbing attack that dismays the foe.

skill.name: Shield Piercer
skill.description: Special javelins will pierce a defender's shield and bend, making the javelin difficult to remove and the shield nearly useless.

skill.name: Muster in Ost Guruth
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands.

skill.name: Muster in Evendim
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Tinnudir in Evendim.

skill.name: Muster in Rivendell
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Rivendell in the Trollshaws.

skill.name: Muster in EsteldÃ­n
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to EsteldÃ­n in the North Downs.

skill.name: Wages of Fear
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Hampering Javelin
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Careful Step
skill.description:
Move in stealth briefly.
Facilitates ability to Ambush.

skill.name: Angry Bees
skill.description: The Bog-Guardian has a hive of bees living inside it, these bees are willing to defend their homes.

skill.name: Root Strike
skill.description: A powerful root launches through the ground at the target, spearing it. This will cause it to be more vunerable to ranged criticals.

skill.name: Bursting Root
skill.description:
A thick trunk of vegetable matter explodes from the ground with a chance of stunning its target.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Spear and Fist
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Spear and Shield
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Fist and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Fist
skill.description: Mastery over the Shield: Allows Warden to perform Shield Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Fist and Shield
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Shield: Allows Warden to perform Shield Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Stealthed Ambush
skill.description:
When attacking from stealth, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: The Dark Before Dawn
skill.description: A Gambit which restores Power and grants some Power over time.

skill.name: Exultation of Battle
skill.description: Drains health from the target to heal the Warden.

skill.name: Improved Swift Bow: Star-light
skill.description:
Loose three missiles in rapid succession.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Improved Swift Bow
skill.description: Loose three missiles in rapid succession.

skill.name: Improved Swift Bow: Ablaze
skill.description:
Loose three missiles in rapid succession.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Improved Merciful Shot
skill.description:
A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 50% health.
Critical hits deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Javelin of Deadly Force
skill.description:
With preparation, some Wardens can throw their Javelins with such deadly force that it will pass completely through several bodies.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

skill.name: Defiant Challenge
skill.description:
Forces up to 10 nearby enemies to attack the Warden.
Allows the Warden to damage all attackers after each blow.

skill.name: Fracture
skill.description: You are capable of drawing an enemy's attention to yourself with this attack. Fracture can also interrupt inducted skills.

skill.name: Aura of Protection
skill.description: When the fight has begun, your aura strengthens your allies' defences against attacks.

skill.name: Brawler's Stance
skill.description: You focus on damaging your opponents.

skill.name: Commander's Stance
skill.description: You focus on healing your allies.

skill.name: Call the Shadow
skill.description: You call upon the Shadow to bolster your attacks against your target.

skill.name: Menacing Roar
skill.description: You roar ferociously, weakening enemies around you.

skill.name: Banner of Horror
skill.description: A horrible banner weakens your enemies' defences, driving deeper Dread into your enemy.

skill.name: Quitters Never Win
skill.description: You rouse your allies with a harsh cry, provoking them into fighting longer.

skill.name: Point-defence
skill.description: Your banner strengthens the defences of allies around you.

skill.name: Purge
skill.description: You free yourself and your allies from all negative combat states.

skill.name: Improved Hide in Plain Sight
skill.description:
Disappear from before the enemy's eyes.
The Burglar can also ignore slowing effects and move at normal runspeed.
Briefly improves Stealth. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Startling Twist
skill.description:
Stun the enemy and remove Corruptions by removing an active Trick.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Fire Trap
skill.description: You place a trap of smoking black oil on the ground which can burn your foes.

skill.name: Tangleshot
skill.description: When a target's movement speed is slowed, this bow-attack deals extreme damage.

skill.name: Steadfast Barrage
skill.description: You focus all of your ranged fire on a single opponent. You cannot move or perform any other actions while in this state. Barraging attacks cannot critical and they cannot miss, be blocked, evaded, or parried.

skill.name: Headshot
skill.description:
You take careful aim and loose your arrow.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 30% of your target's mitigations</rgb>

skill.name: Skirmisher Stance
skill.description: Relaxing the pull of your bow string, reduces your range but allows you shoot while moving.

skill.name: Centre
skill.description: You can recover morale and strength in the midst of combat.

skill.name: Gash
skill.description: A deep cutting strike.

skill.name: Revenge
skill.description: When your target has less than a quarter of their morale, you can make an extremely damaging attack.

skill.name: Keen Eye
skill.description:
You firmly plant your feet and take aim.
<rgb=#00ff00>Each ranged attacked improves your damage, attack speed and inductions. These effects are dispelled upon exiting the stance.</rgb>

skill.name: In Your Face
skill.description: A quick double attack at close range.

skill.name: Improved Herald's Strike
skill.description: This stronger melee attack increases the effects of healing on yourself for a short time and gives Morale to your group. This attack will also remove Corruption.

skill.name: Improved Herald's Strike
skill.description: This melee attack increases the effects of healing on yourself for a short time. This attack will also remove Corruption.

skill.name: Wrath
skill.description: You are able to push past the limits of your wounded body in order to continue fighting.

skill.name: Mutilation
skill.description: A spinning cut that can damage and wound multiple targets around you.

skill.name: Blood Lust
skill.description:
The sight of your opponents falling before you feeds your thirst for blood. The greater your wounds, the greater your fury.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Upper Hand
skill.description: You quickly overwhelm your opponent, reducing their chance to parry or block your blows. While you have the upper hand, Blade Toss is more likely to knock down your opponents.

skill.name: Ravage
skill.description: Three fast attacks on your target.

skill.name: Time-Out
skill.description:
After the defeat of your opponent, you calm down and prepare for your next engagement.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Serration
skill.description: A spinning attack that can damage multiple targets around you.

skill.name: Thrash
skill.description: You savagely attack multiple enemies. Each attack leaves a savage wound, causing your target to take damage over time. Each stack of Savage Wound does 25% more damage.

skill.name: Against The Odds
skill.description: You get a second wind, resetting recovery on many of your skills.

skill.name: Severing Strike
skill.description: A high damage attack that cannot miss, be blocked or parried.

skill.name: Lacerate
skill.description: A quick slashing attack, drawing blood from the enemy.

skill.name: The Boot
skill.description: A powerful kick which interrupts inductions.

skill.name: Gambit Default
skill.description:
This skill updates to the correct Gambit as icons are added to the Gambit display.
If no Gambit matches the current display, this skill will do a minor melee attack and clear the display.

skill.name: Tenderize
skill.description: A sharp blow from the Defiler's staff. May briefly daze the target.

skill.name: Gooey Gourd
skill.description: A gourd filled with sticky mud is launched at your opponent.

skill.name: Curse of Rotten Flesh
skill.description: You plague your target with spores, attacking their defences.

skill.name: Blessing of Darkness
skill.description: You focus upon an ally, redirecting damage taken to yourself while your herbs restore your wounds.

skill.name: Curse of the Melancholic Heart
skill.description: A gourd thrown at the target plagues them with spores, weakening their ability to raise morale. This skill is only effective against players.

skill.name: Anointing of the Slick Flesh
skill.description: A coating of slick mud provides protection against critical attacks and helps ease the sting of ill effects on yourself.

skill.name: Plague of Flies
skill.description:
A gourd filled with flies is launched at your opponent. After the gourd is cracked open, the flies will swarm out obscuring vision and draining power from nearby targets, restoring Power to the Defiler.
Flies are only able to blind Players.

skill.name: Explosive Gourd
skill.description: A gourd filled with burning embers is launched at your opponent, setting them alight.

skill.name: Blight
skill.description: You cover the area in a foul slime that reduces the effectiveness of healing.

skill.name: Efflorescence
skill.description: Living slime relieves the sting of wounds on the flesh of your allies in your fellowship.

skill.name: Sense Prey
skill.description: Your sharp sense of smell allows you to detect the presence of nearby Free Peoples

skill.name: Frenzy
skill.description:
After a critical attack, you drive yourself into a frenzied wrath of tooth and claw.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Critical Response</rgb>

skill.name: Flayer
skill.description:
Forsaking speed and surprise, your attacks are more devastating and your defence is increased. Cannot Stealth or Disappear when Flayer is active.
<rgb=#FF7700>Maul becomes Agonizing Maul.
Stealth becomes Brute.
Claws becomes Raking Claws.
Savage Fangs becomes Brutal Fangs.
Eye Rake becomes Eye Gash.
Disappear becomes Topple.
Dire Howl becomes Howl of Aggression.
Pack Hunters becomes Pack Flayers.
Throat Rip Becomes Muscle tear.
</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Certain abilities have a small chance to activate a brute bonus.</rgb>

skill.name: Rend Flesh
skill.description:
Your attack tears into your opponent's flesh, weakening its defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Critical Response
Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Maul
skill.description:
You tear into your enemy with sharp claws, drawing fresh blood. Reduces Incoming Healing. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Agonizing Maul Deals increased damage. Brute bonus: Applies a healing debuff.
In Shadow: Sudden Maul Deals increased damage. On Crit: Grants an attack speed buff. </rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Rabid Bite
skill.description:
Foaming at the mouth, you bite your opponent.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Flea Bitten
skill.description: You shake fleas onto your target, slowing their actions and making it difficult to focus.

skill.name: Snap
skill.description:
A sharp snap of your jaws and your target's offence is weakened.
<rgb=#FF7700> In Shadow: Snap! On crit: Silences target. </rgb>
On critical hit, your target is disarmed.

skill.name: Dire Howl
skill.description:
You let loose an eerie howl, silencing enemies around you. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Howl of Aggression. Disarms up to 4 targets.
In Shadow: Howl from the Shadow Silences up to 4 targets. </rgb>

skill.name: Swipe
skill.description:
You swipe at the target quickly. This attack cannot be evaded.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Scratch and Snip
skill.description:
You attack with claws and fangs.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Blade Barrier
skill.description: An arcing attack that greets enemies before you with deadly sharp blades.

skill.name: Blade Fury
skill.description: A full area-of-effect attack striking all around you.

skill.name: Bracing Victory
skill.description: Draw upon reserves of strength and renew your morale.

skill.name: Fire Under The Mountain
skill.description: Your damage and Power regeneration are increased. This skill can only be executed during combat when you have greater than 20% Morale. It can only be maintained if your Morale does not drop below 20%.

skill.name: Thunder In The Hall
skill.description: All area attacks do increased damage and their Fervour pip cost and Recovery Time reduced to 0.

skill.name: Ferocious Strike
skill.description: You make two ferocious attacks, building Fervour and removing Corruptions from your target upon criticals.

skill.name: Headbutt
skill.description: Your foes will fall to your furious brow.

skill.name: Horn of Triumph
skill.description: Blow upon your horn in triumph, damaging your enemies and sending them flying backward.

skill.name: Relentless Attack
skill.description: A devastating attack which leaves your foe bleeding.

skill.name: Invigorating Breath
skill.description: You can recover your morale when you block an enemy's attack.

skill.name: Shield Bash
skill.description: After blocking an attack you can slam your shield into your opponent.

skill.name: Stamp
skill.description: Your attack enables you to break your enemy's concentration, interrupting his actions.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: A quick attack that will lightly wound your opponent.

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: Large sweeping strokes cut into all of your foes standing before you.

skill.name: Warding Blow
skill.description: Your great skill enables you to strengthen your defences for a short time.

skill.name: Toxin
skill.description: A ranged attack which flings a draining poison on the target, causing power damage over time.

skill.name: Mephitic Kiss
skill.description: A ranged attack which sprays a contact poison at targets, causing damage over time.

skill.name: Catch Prey
skill.description:
You fling a fine mesh of gossamer silk at your target, giving you a small advantage in manoeuvrability.<rgb=#00ff00>
Steals 2% Block, Parry, and Evade from your target every 4s, while reducing their melee defences.
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Lethal Kiss
skill.description: You fling a tightly compacted ball of webbing coated in acid, damaging your target

skill.name: Paralytic Venom
skill.description: You spit a neurotoxic venom, which paralyzes a target for a short duration.

skill.name: Feast
skill.description:
Upon defeating an opponent, you drink deeply, absorbing their morale.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Steel Grasping Web
skill.description:
A web attack that roots several targets in place. <rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Necrosis
skill.description: You spit a necrotic poison which lowers your target's defences.

skill.name: Grasping Web
skill.description:
A web attack that roots several targets in place. <rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Shadow's Bite
skill.description: You bite your opponent and drink deeply, draining your target's power and leaving them terrified.

skill.name: Quick Recovery
skill.description:
Allows Gambit change mid-stroke.
This skill removes the last Gambit from the Gambit Panel.

skill.name: Recovery
skill.description:
Even Wardens can make mistakes.
This skill resets the Gambit Panel.

skill.name: Adroit Manoeuvre
skill.description: A hit that lets the Warden attack more quickly for a time.

skill.name: Reversal
skill.description: An attack which removes one corruption from the enemy.

skill.name: Warden's Triumph
skill.description: A triumphant blow, allowing the Warden to deal even more damage in close combat.

skill.name: Desperate Flight
skill.description:
Escape from danger and travel to a nearby rally point.
While in PvMP areas, this skill cannot be used in combat.

skill.name: Guide to the Twenty-first Hall
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to the Twenty-first Hall in Moria.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Echad DÃºnann
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Echad DÃºnann in Eregion.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to SÃ»ri-kylÃ¤
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to SÃ»ri-kylÃ¤ in Forochel.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Improved Blade of Elendil
skill.description:
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Deal an attack that does Light damage with an increased Crit chance.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.
This attack never misses and cannot be blocked, parried or evaded.

skill.name: Improved Warding Knowledge
skill.description:
Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.
Circle remains for 1 minute.
Affects the following: Dead, Unseen, Creatures of Nature, Insects and additionally affects Men, Dwarves, Orc-kind, Beasts, and Trolls.

skill.name: Advanced Warding Knowledge
skill.description:
Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.
Circle remains for 1 minute.
Affects the following: Dead, Unseen, Creatures of Nature, Insects, Drakes and additionally affects Men, Dwarves, Orc-kind, Beasts, Trolls, Giants, and Ancient Evils.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge
skill.description:
Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.
Circle remains for 1 minute.
Affects the following: Dead, Unseen, and additionally affects Men, Dwarves, and Orc-kind..

skill.name: Improved Valiant Strike
skill.description: A melee attack that heals the Morale of nearby allies, and also grants a Heal-over-time.

skill.name: Final Word
skill.description: Interrupts inductions being performed by the foe.

skill.name: Steady Hands
skill.description:
Refocuses attunement from one extreme to the other.
After use, skills cost no Power for 15s.
Requires either Battle or Healing Attunement.

skill.name: That Which Does Not Kill Us
skill.description: That which does not kill us makes us stronger. Allies deal increased damage until they are attacked. This first attack is negated and the damage bonus is replaced by a potent heal.

skill.name: Distracting Flame
skill.description: Fire damage-over-time that reduces threat.

skill.name: Mystifying Flame
skill.description: A properly scribed rune can create a flame to confuse your enemies. Greatly reduces threat over time.

skill.name: Vivid Imagery
skill.description:
AoE lightning attack that dazes your foes.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Perfect Imagery
skill.description:
AoE lightning attack that may apply a Writ of Lightning to foes, with a chance to daze foes for 5-10s.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Muster in the Twenty-first Hall
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to the Twenty-first Hall in Moria.

skill.name: Essay of Exaltation
skill.description:
Ground-targeted skill that applies a Morale bubble as well as a powerful Heal-over-time to affected allies.
+Bubble potency and +Healing per attunement consumed.
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Improved Final Word
skill.description: Interrupts inductions being performed by the foe.

skill.name: Improved Our Fates Entwined
skill.description: Fates can be deeply linked if the Rune-keeper wishes. Reduce your fellowship's damage, but pay for it with your own morale. Further reduces 10% of all incoming damage and damage will not interrupt your inductions while the Fates are Entwined.

skill.name: Venomous Haze
skill.description: You can spit blinding poison into the eyes of your enemies, reducing the range of their skills. This skill is only effective against players.

skill.name: Improved Blinding Flash
skill.description:
A flash instantly dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Epic Conclusion
skill.description:
An enormously powerful lightning attack dealing +Damage per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Wages of Fear - Fire
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Javelin of Deadly Force - Fire
skill.description:
With preparation, some Wardens can throw their Javelins with such deadly force that it will pass completely through several bodies.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

skill.name: Shield Piercer of Light
skill.description: Special javelins will pierce a defender's shield and bend, making the javelin difficult to remove and the shield nearly useless.

skill.name: Javelin of Deadly Force - Light
skill.description:
With preparation, some Wardens can throw their Javelins with such deadly force that it will pass completely through several bodies.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

skill.name: Shield Piercer of Fire
skill.description: Special javelins will pierce a defender's shield and bend, making the javelin difficult to remove and the shield nearly useless.

skill.name: Wages of Fear - Light
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Hampering Javelin of Light
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Hampering Javelin of Fire
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Enhanced Gash
skill.description: A deep cutting strike. This strike stuns your target.

skill.description: Call upon your Soldier to assist you in battle, who has trained as a Bannerguard

skill.name: Melt Armour
skill.description: A tactical attack that reduces target armour.

skill.name: Word of Battle
skill.description: A strong tactical attack.

skill.name: Wound-seeker
skill.description: A savage DoT.

skill.name: Bold Arrow
skill.description: A slef buff that increases critical hit chance and damage.

skill.name: Word of Flame
skill.description: Very big tactical nuke.

skill.name: Word of Frost
skill.description: Tactical nuke that slows attack and damage.

skill.name: Defender of All
skill.description: An AOE force attack that also generates threat on all targets.

skill.name: Solitary Defender
skill.description: A single target forcet attack that also generates threat. This skill is used often.

skill.name: The Sky is Falling
skill.description: You cluck shrilly, panicking at the wide open space above you!

skill.name: Wing Buffet
skill.description: Flapping your wings at an enemy can push them backwards, gaining you more time to flee. Can only be used against monster player targets.

skill.name: DNT - Add Hint to target for Capture
Yum! No wonder mobs eat this...
DNT - Are there any friends near?
Springfest Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Spring Festival.

skill.name: Prized Tame Redhorn-goat
skill.description: The Iron Garrison Miners have been training Redhorn mountain-goats to use as mounts. These sure-footed creatures can traverse the rocky passageways of Moria where no horse could go. This is one of their tame goats, making it not as fast as others.

skill.name: Prized Tame Redhorn-goat
skill.description: The Iron Garrison Miners have been training Redhorn mountain-goats to use as mounts. These sure-footed creatures can traverse the rocky passageways of Moria where no horse could go. This is one of their tame goats, making it not as fast as others.

skill.name: Prized Nimble Redhorn-goat
skill.description: As a great ally of the Iron Garrison Miners, one can expect access to their most well-trained and quickest goats. This goat can move as fast as most horses.

skill.description: A pony from the Yule Festival.

skill.description: As a great ally of the Iron Garrison Miners, one can expect access to their most well-trained and quickest goats. This goat can move as fast as most horses.

skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Men of Bree, you're able to quickly return to Bree. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Return to Thorin's Gate
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall, you're able to quickly return to Thorin's Gate. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Herbalist's Care
skill.description: A minor heal.

skill.name: Direct Soldier
skill.description: Direct your Soldier to engage the selected foe.

skill.name: Passage of Foes
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby Orcs, trolls, giants, and evil Men or dwarves.

skill.name: Passage of Shadow
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of the dead, the unseen, and ancient evil.

skill.name: Passage of Nature
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby beasts and other natural creatures.

skill.name: Clear Defeat
skill.description: Removes tier 1 dread obtained from defeat.

skill.name: Clear Defeat
skill.description: Removes tier 2 dread obtained from defeat.

skill.name: Clear Defeat
skill.description: Removes tier 3 dread obtained from defeat.

skill.name: Clear Defeat
skill.description: Removes tier 4 dread obtained from defeat.

skill.description: A pony from the Fall Festival.

skill.name: Yule Festival Snow Pony
skill.description: A pony from the Yule Festival.

skill.name: Return to Mirkwood
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Elven forces in Mirkwood, you're able to quickly return to Emyn LÃ»m in Mirkwood. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Mirk-eaves
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Mirk-eaves.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Muster in Mirk-eaves
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to the Mirk-eaves in Mirkwood.

skill.name: Improved Knowledge of Cures
skill.description: Cleanse multiple wounds, diseases, poisons, or fears from an ally.

skill.name: Improved Do Not Fall This Day
skill.description: You have foreseen that your ally will not fall this day. For the remainder of combat, if the target of this skill is defeated, they will be revived.

skill.name: Burglar's Antidote
skill.description: Cures a harmful debuff affecting yourself and restores a small amount of Power.

skill.name: Remorseless Strike
skill.description:
Uses fervour to deal a devastating attack.
This attack is hard to defend.
Critical hits deal massive damage.
Critical hits will reset Emboldened Blades passive back to tier 1.

skill.name: Remorseless Strike
skill.description:
Uses fervour to deal a devastating attack.
This attack is hard to defend.
Critical hits deal massive damage.
Critical hits will reset Emboldened Blades passive back to tier 1.

skill.name: Brutal Charge
skill.description: Charge with a burst of speed and increased melee damage. Grants immunity to slowing effects for 10s.

skill.name: Fighting Withdrawal
skill.description:
Breaks the effects of Dazes, Stuns and Knockdowns.
Briefly increases Parry rating.

skill.name: DNT - zero out threat for target
Return to Ost Guruth
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Eglain people in the Lone-lands, you are able to quickly return to their homestead at Ost Guruth.

skill.name: Herbalist's Care
skill.description: A minor heal.

skill.name: Mischievous Delight
skill.description:
Restore both Morale and Power by removing an active Trick from the foe.
This skill will never miss against on-level targets, nor can it be parried, blocked, or evaded.

skill.name: True Heroics
skill.description: Restores the power of your Fellows and grants other bonuses based on your Trait Specialization.

skill.name: Warrior's Fortitude
skill.description: You have the ability to raise your Morale above its normal maximum and gain a buff based on stance.

skill.name: Watchful Shield-brother
skill.description: A toggle marking an ally as your Shield-brother, making them the target of some of your abilities.

skill.name: Air-lore
skill.description:
Air continually swirls around your target ally, inflicting damage on any who strike it.
Cannot be used on self.

skill.name: Improved Beneath Notice
skill.description: Reduces threat and restores Power-over-time.

skill.name: Song of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
A Song so potent that it provides you with a shield of morale that must be destroyed before you will begin losing morale again. The name comes from the adage that those who know this song were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself.
Bubble strength is 35% of your Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Improved Rune-sign of Flame
skill.description:
<rgb=#00FFDD>Affinity - Fire Affinity skills will change their effects when you use an elemental skill (frost, fire, lightning).</rgb>
A Rune-sign will not only inspire, but infuses an ally with elemental powers.

skill.name: Rune-sign of Winter
skill.description:
A heal-over-time that always applies the Frost Armour passive buff
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Improved Rune-sign of Storm
skill.description:
<rgb=#00FFDD>Affinity - Lightning Affinity skills will change their effects when you use an elemental skill (frost, fire, lightning).</rgb>
A Rune-sign will not only inspire, but infuses an ally with elemental powers.

skill.name: Unerring Strike
skill.description: A mighty blow that is very difficult to block, parry or evade. Deals bonus damage if the target was recently hit with Mighty Blow.

skill.name: Sure Strike
skill.description: A melee attack that cannot be blocked or parried.

skill.name: Ignore the Pain
skill.description: Removes one poison, disease, fear, or wound effect.

skill.name: Pale Golden Summer Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Summer Festival.

skill.name: Pale Golden Summer Pony
skill.description: A pony from the Summer Festival.

skill.name: Blood Arrow
skill.description: A damaging shot that also restores the Hunter's Morale and removes Corruptions from the target.

skill.name: Dazing Blow
skill.description:
Dazes the enemy with a pair of melee attacks while dual-wielding.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Dazing Blow
skill.description:
Dazes the enemy with a pair of melee attacks while dual-wielding.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Fear Nothing!
skill.description: You feel the joy of battle coursing through your veins. You Fear Nothing!

skill.name: Return to Enedwaith
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Men of Enedwaith, you're able to quickly return to Nan Laeglin in Enedwaith. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Fly True
skill.description: This shot can only be used against those that bear the DÃºnedain Mark, but once marked, the enemy takes devastating damage. This skill can only be used from stealth. It will never miss against on-level creatures. On a critical the target will take power damage as well.

skill.name: Steed of Night
skill.description: Black as the night, this unique looking pony has 250 Morale and is as fast as a reputation mount. The pony has the added benefit of not knocking you off immediately when critically hit by an attacker.

skill.name: Steed of Night
skill.description: Black as the night, this unique looking horse has 250 Morale and is as fast as a reputation mount. The horse has the added benefit of not knocking you off immediately when critically hit by an attacker.

skill.name: Righteousness Arrow
skill.description: These arrows will make servants of the Eye burn, fearing as they do the goodness of the DÃºnedain.

skill.name: DÃºnedain Mark
skill.description: The DÃºnedain excel at stalking their prey, and few indeed can escape their notice. This skill is the prerequisite of Fly True.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: The Rangers of the North have always been skilled at becoming unseen when they wish to be.

skill.name: DÃºnadan's Strike
skill.description: A Ranger is both master of blade and bow. This attack will stun the opponent.

skill.name: Blood of the DÃºnedain
skill.description: Strength of morale has long been a noted feature of the line of Elros. This will restore morale to the Ranger.

skill.name: Dagger Throw
skill.description: This well thrown knife will root an in-bound target.

skill.name: Coordinated Strike
skill.description: Your Herald has a chance to stun the target with a melee attack. Additionally, your Herald will do 100% more damage if they are behind the target.

skill.name: Lend Resolve
skill.description: Your Herald encourages you in times of battle, raising your morale at the cost of his own as well as granting you a burst of Power.

skill.name: Lend Courage
skill.description: Your Herald encourages you in times of battle, greatly raising your morale at the cost of his own.

skill.name: Shadow's Lament
skill.description:
A powerful melee attack that harms the foe.
Puts you into a Battle-readied State.

skill.description: A horse painted in a festive, if frightening, visage to help celebrate Bilbo's Haunted Burrow in Hobbiton.

Increases Light, Fire, Frost, and Lightning Damage of all nearby fellowship or raid members.

<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 1 ballad buff present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

Essence of Toad has a million and one uses. Whether it's a troublesome enemy, an annoying friend, or a beautiful woman who's out of your league, in the end all glory will be yours.
Will cause nearby players to faint.

skill.name: Vile Vittles
skill.description:
Nothing about these vittles looks right, but you're probably going to try them anyways.
Liver, don't fail me now!

skill.description:
Swallow this potion to breathe fire and win the admiration of any who stand near.
There goes your eyebrows...

skill.name: Saffron's Lipstick
skill.description:
Warning: Kissing someone with this lipstick will leave him feeling groggy.
A very special kiss...

skill.name: Monster Fare
skill.description:
Ingredients: Whole grain oats, Sandson's Farm chicken by-products, tater meal, toad concentrate, hobbit-toes, Elf-ears, dwarf-beards, added colours, people.
Yum! No wonder mobs eat this...

skill.description: Lilacs, vanilla, freshly baked cookies. These are NOT the types of smells this item will create.

skill.name: Improved Gut Punch
skill.description: When your target begins preparing an attack, you give them a swift punch to the gut to interrupt their preparation.

skill.name: Hatchlings: Scytode Brood
skill.description: You summon one of your scytode brood to aid you in battle. Scytode brood hatchlings are not as durable as the strong brood, but utilize ranged attacks to keep opponents at bay.

skill.name: Poisonous Silk
skill.description: The hatchling spits toxin infused threads of silk damaging and slowing its prey. If the threads are not removed the prey becomes completely immobilized.

skill.name: Contact Poison
skill.description:
The hatchling spits contact poison at their prey, with each application causing more severe damage.
<rgb=#00ff00>Consumes Necrosis to apply max stacks.</rgb>

skill.name: Acid Spit
skill.description: moderate ranged attack

skill.name: Improved Vital Target
skill.description: Your knowledge of the enemy is so great that you can target vital organs with great efficacy, and focus yourself for subsequent attacks.

skill.name: Skirmisher: Strong Pull
skill.description: You pull on your bow and loose an arrow.

skill.name: Skirmisher: Flaming Arrow
skill.description: A fire tipped arrow which will continue to burn the target after landing.

skill.name: Skirmisher: Tangleshot
skill.description: When a target's movement speed is slowed, this bow-attack deals extreme damage.

skill.name: Skirmisher: Hindering Shot
skill.description: A shaft aimed to slow the movement of your quarry.

skill.name: Snow-jar
skill.description: This looks like a budget version of a snow globe. It's basically just a handful of snow...in a jar. If you want it to snow you'll probably just have to open it and turn it upside down.

skill.name: Frosty Beverage
skill.description: Frostily delicious! Warning: It's got a bit of a kick.

skill.name: Bucket of Fear
skill.description: The only thing to fear is...a crazy person with a bucket on his head.

skill.name: Black Silk Glove
skill.description: This black silk glove has a name stitched into its wrist: 'Bigby'.

skill.name: Candle and Mirror
skill.description: Using a candle, a mirror, a right angle, and some alcohol (for the victim) the illusion of a ghost can be created around the target.

skill.name: Pile of Fluffy Snow
skill.description: A pile of very fine, very fluffy snow that... doesn't melt?

skill.name: Spider Leg
skill.description: Poking friends with spider legs makes for lots of laughs.

skill.name: D.R.A.G.O.N.
skill.description: You don't know what D.R.A.G.O.N. stands for, so you best try this on someone else. Though there is some fine print: 'Made with 10% real dragons'.

skill.name: Grim Crystal
skill.description: This crystal came from a Grim. You wonder what will happen when you crush it. You should probably crush it in the direction of someone else.

skill.name: Application of 'Coveritol'
skill.description: Instructions: Apply gently, but firmly to target's face. One application per usage. Please see your Minstrel if conditions persist. WARNING: Target must remove all hats, helms, and other headgear for Coveritol to function properly.

skill.name: Potent Bird Seed
skill.description: Apparently this bird seed has been mixed with Lembas making it highly desireable to birds, though it smells quite *fowl* to you! (haha!)

skill.name: Perfect Snowball
skill.description: This is probably the best snowball that has ever been made. Just the right weight. Just the right amount of moisture. Just the right number of ice shards to really take down your victim.

skill.name: Specimen Jar: Gross Bugs
skill.description: It's a bit redundant to call these 'Gross Bugs' as all bugs are inherently gross.

skill.name: Doom-shroom
skill.description: It's kinda like a gross piÃ±ata, except instead of giving you candy it gives you gross.

skill.name: Swift Blade
skill.description: A swift sweeping melee attack.

skill.name: Trick: Improved Counter Defence
skill.description:
Strike to lower the enemy's defences.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Improved Subtle Stab
skill.description: A quick, sharp attack that reduces the cooldown of Mischievous Delight.

skill.name: Improved Startling Twist
skill.description:
Stun multiple enemies and remove Corruptions by removing an active Trick.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Riddle
skill.description:
Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
Does not break Stealth.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Riddle
skill.description:
Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
Does not break Stealth.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Guardian's Ward Tactics
skill.description: Strengthens defences briefly.

skill.name: Improved Overwhelm
skill.description:
Deal a powerful attack, slowing the target's attacks if they are suffering from a Deep Wound.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Retaliation or Whirling Retaliation.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Slow replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Whirling Retaliation
skill.description: After parrying, whirl to attack enemies in a circle. Draws threat from all Fellowship members within 10 metres.

skill.name: Spear and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Shield
skill.description: Mastery over the Shield: Allows Warden to perform Shield Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Fist and Fist
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Improved Guardian's Defence
skill.description: This stance focuses your defences on blocking attacks. Causes enemies that attack you to continue to attack you or they will be snared.
